com.revature.rideshare.matching.services

Class MatchService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.rideshare.matching.services.MatchService

  • @Service
public class MatchService
extends java.lang.Object
    The main service class for finding drivers who match a given rider.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MatchService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<User> findMatches(User rider)
      Finds matched drivers for rider based on a weighted rank from distance batch end, and whether they are liked or disliked drivers (affected drivers).
      java.util.List<User> findMatchesByAffects(User rider)
      Finds matched drivers for given rider by office location only, based on if they are liked or disliked drivers (affected drivers).
      java.util.List<User> findMatchesByBatchEnd(User rider)
      Finds matched drivers for rider based on the batch's end date.
      java.util.List<User> findMatchesByDistance(User rider)
      Finds matched drivers for given riders by distance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MatchService

        public MatchService()

    • Method Detail

      • findMatchesByDistance

        public java.util.List<User> findMatchesByDistance(User rider)
        Finds matched drivers for given riders by distance. Association formed between driver and a ranking, with ranking discarded after sorting.
        Parameters:
        rider - the user looking for a ride
        Returns:
        unranked list of matched drivers, sorted by distance in descending order (up to MAX_MATCHES)

      • findMatchesByAffects

        public java.util.List<User> findMatchesByAffects(User rider)
        Finds matched drivers for given rider by office location only, based on if they are liked or disliked drivers (affected drivers).
        Parameters:
        rider - the user looking for a ride
        Returns:
        unranked list of matched drivers, minus affected (up to MAX_MATCHES)

      • findMatchesByBatchEnd

        public java.util.List<User> findMatchesByBatchEnd(User rider)
        Finds matched drivers for rider based on the batch's end date. Association formed between driver and a ranking, with rank discarded after sorting.
        Parameters:
        rider - the user looking for a ride
        Returns:
        unranked list of matched drivers, sorted by batch end date in descending order

      • findMatches

        public java.util.List<User> findMatches(User rider)
        Finds matched drivers for rider based on a weighted rank from distance batch end, and whether they are liked or disliked drivers (affected drivers).
        Parameters:
        rider - the user for whom to find a driver
        Returns:
        list of matched drivers, sorted by nearest distance and closest batch end date in descending order (up to MAX_MATCHES)
